metadata.title: Ichthyofauna of the Continental Slope of the Bering Sea and Some Aspects of its Origin and Formation
metadata.description: The achievement of the multidisciplinary year round fishery research in a vast area of water which includes regions which are varied in their relief, Oceanological characteristics and flora and fauna, has allowed us to compare data which characterize the biology, behavior and abundance of the most important commercial and food items in different habitats.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Record collected on Ichthyofauna of the continental slope of the Bering Sea and some aspects of it's origin and formation.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown
